response.original_title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 – The Final Countdown
response.overview: We got to stay with Warhorse Studios for the final day before the release of Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 and talk about how the studio got to the place where they could actually make a sequel. We dive deep behind the scenes to talk about creating KCD2, we attend the studio’s release party the night before the game launched, we’re there when they see the reviews for the first time and release the game to the players.
response.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 – The Final Countdown
